name: COVID-19 Cases per US State
content:
Description: live dataset, updated weekly, on confirmed cases of COVID-19 per US state

Source: [DataHub](https://datahub.io/core/covid-19#data)  
 
Columns

* Date (string): the recorded date associated with new COVID-19 cases for that state 
* State (string): what state recorded new COVID-19 cases
* Confirmed New Cases (numerical): how many new confirmed cases were recorded in that state for that day
* Deaths (numerical)): how many deaths caused by COVID-19 occurred in that state for the day
